name: Skeppskatten går iland
storyline: This is a story about the ship cat Pricken who has become tired of life out at sea and decided to go back on land in Öregrund. Although is life as a landlubber going to be as fun as he believes it to be?
summary:
An educational game for kids teaching Swedish words when they have just started to learn reading and writing.

The game will teach:
- Read and writing
- Consonant lengthening
- Word comprehension
- Synonyms
- Phonics
- Create with text and image
